Question: In the context of the AI workflow presented in these materials which of the following is not an example of a valid feedback loop?
Answer: Trying different data transformations on a given model
Returning to the data collection stage from transformations to reduce the number of transforms
Performing EDA on the data after a model has been deployed and data have been logged
Moving from the business opportunity and data collection to model iteration
Returning to discuss the business opportunity after a model has been deployed
Correct: Moving from the business opportunity and data collection to model iteration

Question: Common sources of performance drift include:
Answer: Changes in customer demographics or user behavior after a model is trained
Incomplete, incorrect or unbalanced training data
Changes in versions of libraries or modules used in models
